Re (Cnt): Furthermore, you have to clarify the definition of 'deserve', and 'judge' that you are using in the given context. As far as I know, my vocabulary lacks it- the terms are very vague, owing to their subjective, non-generic definitions. It is better to restrict the aforementioned to irrational conversations. That said, if you were looking for 'like minded incompetent individuals like yourself', it might work as intended, in attracting those 'enraged insects with their souls burning with pseudo-justice', and to 'takedown the evil'. That said 'that evil' in this case is protected by TOR over a VPN, running on a very secure OS, resulting to an almost US DOD grade anonymity; tough luck.  Regardless, this ends the conversation.

One of the few mind control doujinshi i've enjoyed.

@Not My Proudest Fap: because hypnosis removes the need for storytelling and gets the reader into the action almost immediately. Pesky questions like, "why are these characters fucking" and "why did the girl fall so easily" are all answered by the use of hypnosis. There are plenty of hypnosis series out there (Hypno Blink for example) that use hypnosis in interesting ways and is more than a tool to get characters naked, but generally that's all it's used for.

All he said were two lines and suddenly the president was all over his dick like white on rice. Admittedly he probably didn't need to convince her as much due to her natural inclinations, but still. So far he's been pretty tame with it despite having an OP ability, so it'd be nice to see him use it a bit more in the next chapter, imo.

This is pretty good. @Rainsong thank you for translating this chapter!

@madman: You're totally fine! Like I said, I realized it wasn't aimed at me but at the work itself, and I do agree as well. I honestly wish it wasn't so blacked out, too. In some parts it was so bad it might as well have been totally censored out. Maybe one day Japan will update their censorship laws so we won't have to deal with stuff like this unnecessarily anymore. Let us pray.

Oh, didn't think I'd miss such a good series. Thanks @Rainsong for translating this!!

@madman: I can agree with that, but there was nothing I could do about that myself. I just worked with the raws that were available. The time it would've taken to manually remove the censoring and redraw all the panels would've been too excessive for me, personally. And my editing skills aren't really on that level anyway. I know that probably wasn't even aimed at me but I'm just explaining my position anyway.

PSA: For anyone who may be confused, this is chapter 2/2 (of what's released). Just in case anyone came here from the front page and hasn't seen the series before. I forgot to mark that in the title itself. Chapter 1 is here: https://nhentai.net/g/370447/.
